name: PastelMix Inspired V4
description:
Hi! this is the third of 4 LORA's i trained based on the PastelMix Model by andite.

It tries to replicate the style without taking too much from the original model.

I recomend using it at 0.6 - 0.7 Weight

Each one was trained in a Different dataset so i cant say wich one is a better version.

This Version was trained on Abyss Orange Mix 2 - Hard (expect compatibility with NSFW)

All samples were generated at 320x320 Hires Fix x2 Latent Clip skip 2

modelVersions.name: V4
modelVersions.description: This version in particular includes way more "Dark skin" "dark-skinned_female" and "green_skin" in the dataset to add versatility (also... we all love Gobbos so have fun)

meta.prompt: (masterpiece:1.4), (best quality:1.4), extremely detailed, intricate, hyper detailed, illustration,soft lighting, cinematic, 1girl, v-shaped eyebrows, Dark chestnut hair, colorful, colorized, from_behind ,animal_costume , bedroom <lora:pastelStyleV4:0.6>
